title: Fist of Fear, Touch of Death

sources.title: Fist of Fear, Touch of Death (1980)
sources.description: A television reporter interviews fighters and promoters about Bruce Lee in preparation for a tournament to claim the title of “Successor to the Bruce Lee legacy”. Footage from Bruce Lee's films and interviews is repurposed in pseudo-documentary style. Watch on RetroFlix: https://retroflix.org/fist-of-fear-touch-of-death-1980/

metadata.Plot: A reporter interviews fighters and promoters about Bruce Lee, intercut with footage from old Bruce Lee films and pseudo-documentary footage.
metadata.Actors: Bruce Lee, Fred Williamson, Ron Van Clief
